website_summaries.verdict: This digital air fryer is easy to use and comes with a Keep Warm feature if you're not ready to eat the food right away.
pros: Digital display allows precise temperature settings
5 temperature presets, including a Keep Warm option
Cleaning is easy, thanks to the nonstick baskets
Produces an evenly cooked result every time
cons: The air fryer isn't big enough to accommodate meals for large households

website_summaries.verdict: Skip this air fryer and give a hard side-eye to this entire product category. Your money would be better spent on a toaster oven.
pros: The Philips Airfryer Avance Collection works well when you want to heat frozen convenience foods like mozzarella sticks or pizza rolls
cons: The air fryer wasn't any better than an oven when it came to cooking fresh foods like homemade french fries or chicken wings
The air fryer costs nearly $300 when it's not on sale, which is way too much money when you consider its limited capabilities and its mediocre performance

customer_reviews.title: No regrets, great fryer.
customer_reviews.text: Received it today, unpacked it and fired it up. The first food I cooked in it was Coconut shrimp and fries both entries turn out perfect with the right amount of color. Shrimp was crunchy and golden and the fries were perfect brown. Taste was great. If your on the fence about purchasing this don't hesitate you will not be disappointed. Food was awesome and cleanup is a breeze. Fryer has some weight to it. that I like, it feels solid and well made. Cut the cooking time from a toaster oven that I'm use to using in about half the time and turned out much better. The grease from the picture was off the Shrimp.
customer_reviews.author: Danny  Matthews

customer_reviews.title: I have never fallen in love so fast with a kitchen appliance
customer_reviews.text: I have never fallen in love so fast with a kitchen appliance. It works well. The second cooking rack is essential. With it, I can cook all the chicken I need for 2 people. Without it, it holds enough for 1 person.
customer_reviews.author: Deborah

customer_reviews.title: Temperature Settings are NOT flexible
customer_reviews.text: Unknown to me, the temperature settings on this fryer are limited to 25 degree increments - 200, 225, 250, 300 etc. Not being familiar with this type of cooking, I searched online for recipes and VERY few have settings for these degrees - many require like 230 degrees or 380, etc. The app and documents that come with this fryer only include a handful of recipes. Maybe I missed this detail in the description, but if I had known this, I would have opted for a different model. Too expensive in my mind to be this limiting.
customer_reviews.author: kathee1g

customer_reviews.title: Fat Free Frying!
customer_reviews.text: I love my air fryer! Most packaged foods like tater tots, cauliflower tots, veggie burgers, Texas Toast, have enough of their own fat content to fry up perfectly without adding a drop of oil. The rest like homemade falafel and spring rolls get a spritz of spray oil and they're good to go. It also cooks quickly and evenly. The turbo feature of this air fryer is what makes it great and worth a little extra money over cheaper brands. I can't live without it! It's a dream to clean but, I also use the parchment paper liners with holes to help keep it clean. I found them here on Amazon. I heartily recommend this Philips Air Fryer.
customer_reviews.author: Sharon Fallon

customer_reviews.title: Excellent for veggies!
customer_reviews.text: Our main reason for purchasing the air fryer was to cook veggies, and it definitely does not disappoint. It's so easy. Toss chopped assorted veggies with a little olive oil and spices, and spoon the mixture into the fryer basket, cook for ~15 minutes, stirring once. Super simple, super quick, with excellent results every time. And super easy to clean.
customer_reviews.author: Celeste Hodges

customer_reviews.title: So terrible! Is it healthy
customer_reviews.text: It’s hard to clean. So terrible! Is it healthy! Now when I cook there r many smoke come out
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Temperature control
customer_reviews.text: I would give it 5 stars but the temperature only increases in 25 degree imcrements even though their recipe book calls for temp of 390, I can get only 375 or 400. Called, couldnt get through. Instruction book didnt address problem nor did the 15 or so youtube clips ive watched. Finally got through. This model only offers temps in 25 degree implements. Buy another model!!
customer_reviews.author: K. Siders

customer_reviews.title: Smells like burnt plastic. I had to open the windows to let the smell out - returning
customer_reviews.text: I don't want this smell near my food. Maybe it's defective or maybe the smell will go away after many times that I will use it, but now I don't want to eat anything from this fryer.
customer_reviews.author: happy consumer

customer_reviews.title: Great product for a single person.
customer_reviews.text: Even though the Phillips product cost a little more, it was well worth it. I especially like the 4 preset items. I've cooked pork chops, chicken breasts, and salmon along with regular and sweet potato fries and they all came out perfect.
customer_reviews.author: boyduffer

customer_reviews.title: Simple/Easy but not hot enough for many recipes
customer_reviews.text: Great air fryer for the price. Certainly easy to clean and use. The controls take a bit of getting used to, but don't require advanced math or charts. However, a quick search online will reveal many, many recipes that ask for temperatures over 400 degrees Farenheit. That is the upper limit on the Philips TurboStar. So, while fries generally do come out crispy, some things like tempuras and wontons don't come out as thoroughly crispy as with other, hotter friers. Also, you can only adjust by 25 degrees at a time so you will compromise for some of those exacting recipes. I can live with that, but if you are a scientific food person, that will annoy you.
customer_reviews.author: Ronn Brashear

customer_reviews.title: I like it but have two cook 2-3 rounds to feed kids
customer_reviews.text: It works good but I have to make 2 batches every time . it only fits enough to feed 1 or 2 depending if you eat like a super saying . Easy to clean but when you take out food have a towel laid somewhere so the button don’t burn your surface .
customer_reviews.author: Luis Villarreal

customer_reviews.title: Good results but now broken at 32 days
customer_reviews.text: It works great but like all cooking products has to be cleaned and which is kind of messy depending on what you cooked. Update: the handle for the basket is now broken and I missed the return date by 3 days. Sucks. I’ll
customer_reviews.author: Dudtal

customer_reviews.title: I wish I would have known sooner how wonderful having an Airfryer is!
customer_reviews.text: I use this airfryer just about every day! Makes frozen food taste great! Easy to use. Easy to clean. I bought a meat grilling accessory to grill fresh chicken in it. I bread the chicken and it comes out crispy on the outside and moist and tender inside. I love it! My favorite thing to make in it is grilled cheese sammiches. Really happy with this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Kimberly Mead

customer_reviews.title: one stars
customer_reviews.text: the handle of this product was not tight enough so it was very shaky and the bottom basket part doesnt close tight either.... I am definitely returning and do not recommend buying this!
customer_reviews.author: Aken

customer_reviews.title: Not worth it
customer_reviews.text: Not a fan. Basket doesnt hold enough for 2. Took 25 mins to make one serving of fries. They really do not taste like French Fries. It is heavy, large and awkward to store. If you do not eat fried foods at home often its not worth the high cost of buying and at 1400 watts the cost of operating. Enjoy good fries when you eat out.
customer_reviews.author: Alx Fox

customer_reviews.title: top of the line
customer_reviews.text: would have given phillips airfryer a 10 if it were offered the best air fryer tryed the cheaaaaaap ones dont waste your time and money get the best out there phillips ps when will people learn this is the only way to cook
customer_reviews.author: david dillingham

customer_reviews.title: It works, love it.
customer_reviews.text: Tried out a few times and it works wonderful. Highly recommend. Thanks.
customer_reviews.author: JH

customer_reviews.title: Surprised by how well it works
customer_reviews.text: Okay, we all know that these things don't actually fry in the conventional sense, but this Philips unit produces results on par with a commercial turbo convection oven. We love Brussels sprouts and "frying" them in the Philips has become our favorite way of cooking them. I figured it would be a one-trick pony and destined to live in the cellar next to the bread machine (remember those?) but I was wrong. The Philips gets used almost every day. It seems well made and the controls are incredibly intuitive.
customer_reviews.author: RedSoxFan

customer_reviews.title: Took me awhile but I'm in love.
customer_reviews.text: At first it was all fries, fries, fries. Then I started air roasting vegetables and boneless, skinless chicken breasts. Chicken is the real test. If you cook it precisely, it's the best chicken breast you'll ever eat - crispy on the outside and tender and juicy on the inside. I'm hooked.
customer_reviews.author: Coco

customer_reviews.title: Cooking without oils is great for your heart health!
customer_reviews.text: Wonderful! This fryer is truly one of the best, if not the THE best, I have ever known about. Since I and my family only eat a whole food plant based diet and use no oil, this is perfect for french fries and other foods we thought we would never eat again. But this brings those comfort foods back plus many new ones.
customer_reviews.author: R. Reese

customer_reviews.title: We Love It!
customer_reviews.text: How did we live without this? Chicken is moist and delicious, and takes 22 minutes to cook. Throw in some Alton Brown seasoning before you cook it and enjoy. It’s SO GOOD! We have also made fries, which were delicious as well.
customer_reviews.author: Grace

customer_reviews.title: Good Air Fryer
customer_reviews.text: I like this Air Fryer but don't love it. So far I've made some great Sugar Snap Pea recipes, different types of French Fries and even tried some Spam. All worked great and quick. The metal screen at the bottom is poorly designed though and the pan (the part that pulls out) is difficult to clean.
customer_reviews.author: David Lindsay

customer_reviews.title: Works great
customer_reviews.text: I bought this because it was the top rated air fryer according to ATK. I've been very happy with it so far, there is a learning curve to cooking with it and I'm still learning. The controls are intuitive and well laid out, and there is a general feeling of quality with this device. Time will tell but as of now I'm very happy with this and have already made some great food with it.
customer_reviews.author: David B. Neely

customer_reviews.title: Used it today
customer_reviews.text: Today I cooked a veal patty from Omaha Steaks, latkes from Trader Joe, and also Mango & Rice Spring Rolls from Trader Joe. All went from frozen to delightful in a short amount of time. I'm sure I'll get better estimating cook times as I use it more, but there's also plenty of YouTube videos to provide tips. I'm looking forward to using this item alot.
customer_reviews.author: M. R. Lange

customer_reviews.title: Best air fryer!!!
customer_reviews.text: Best air fryer ever! We’ve had a different brand before and this one delivers the best flavor and texture on the market. It’s easy to use and more compact than others. It has a slightly smaller capacity than the huge models, but you can still cook enough fries for two people at once. My only complaint is that if you try to dump the contents of the dry compartment onto a plate or other dish, the bottom of the basket falls out. I like that it is removable for cleaning though.
customer_reviews.author: Kevin mcdaniel

customer_reviews.title: I like this cooker
customer_reviews.text: I like this cooker. The problem is finding the accessories. I want a grill pan. The one listed with the item is the wrong size. Has anybody found the grill pan HD9940 to go with this?
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer

customer_reviews.title: Will it air fry?
customer_reviews.text: Yes, it will. All I can say about this Phillips model is that it works really well and I love it. Everything that I have put in it so far has come out leagues better than microwave and oven. I even threw my old Black & Decker toaster oven out the door when the Phillips air fryer showed up and produced amazing results.
customer_reviews.author: SurferBud1

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use!
customer_reviews.text: There isn't anything I do not like about this product. It is easy to clean, small enough for my counter, large enough for two people, and look nice. I have owned two other air fryers. One made too much noise, so I sent it back. The other, I gave to my daughter. I decided to splurge a little on the Phillips and I am glad I did. It is easier to clean, makes less noise, and cooks a little faster and more evenly. So far, no peeling coating on the inside and no funny/odd smells. For me, it is worth the extra cost.
customer_reviews.author: Sharon

customer_reviews.title: Not that good.
customer_reviews.text: after purchasing, I found out that most fried foods cook better at 450 degrees. This one only goes up to 400 so if you want your food well cooked and crispy, it has to go twice as long as reccommended. Not any faster than the oven.
customer_reviews.author: Patricia E. Wong

customer_reviews.title: Not able to choose temperatures
customer_reviews.text: This air fryer can only go in 25 degree changes. It starts at 350. Then it will go to 375, then 400. Some recipes use 360 or 380 degrees. You cannot change the preset temperatures. BAD FEATURE for such an expensive air fryer. You can go lower also, down to 325, 300, etc. But no temperatures in between.
customer_reviews.author: Judy Wacht

customer_reviews.title: Experiment with timing to get to know how long to cook various foods
customer_reviews.text: Love to use it for mixed fresh cut vegetables- also good warming up Frye’s and other frozen food
customer_reviews.author: TCreilly

customer_reviews.title: Very even cooking. Easy to clean. Turns out delicious
customer_reviews.text: We love it. We use it several times a week. Easy to Clean. Easy to operate. Does an excellent job with frozen foods and fresh chicken and salmon. Might buy the largest size in a couple years
customer_reviews.author: manteno203

customer_reviews.title: Easy to clean, easy to use, better than an oven
customer_reviews.text: I've basically stopped using my oven for most of my cooking and use the airfryer. You do not have to preheat it, and it cooks food in half the time. Its always crunchy on the outside and moist on the inside.
customer_reviews.author: Skyeelyse

customer_reviews.title: Makes delicious crispy food
customer_reviews.text: I love cooking with this thing. It is basically a toaster oven - but it it is the best toaster oven. The food cooks up quickly and comes out crispy. I usually am cooking for just two people and this can fit enough food for a meal for two; it is also nice to not need to use my full size oven when it is not necessary.
customer_reviews.author: Joe Braucher

customer_reviews.title: Tried 2 other brands/styles and returned them
customer_reviews.text: After returning 2 other air fryers, I was done! After seeing my sons Philips, I ordered it. Soo easy, roomy, quiet and fries to perfection!
customer_reviews.author: donna

customer_reviews.title: I have it for 4 years
customer_reviews.text: I have it for 4 years and I used It almost every day, I so happy to have it in my Kitchen , Air fryer like magic all the food fried but without oil
customer_reviews.author: Iman

customer_reviews.title: Best kitchen appliance ever.
customer_reviews.text: Got this as a gift for my mom, and she could not love it more. She uses it almost daily. She has made wings, fish, fries, and much more. Super quick in cooking food, super easy to clean, and so so so so easy to use. Best kitchen appliance ever.
customer_reviews.author: Samir

customer_reviews.title: Poor design, easy to jam.
customer_reviews.text: The Phillips air fryer is fabulous. It is easy to use and a very healthy way to cook. The problem is after only 7 or 8 uses the machine is jammed. The door will not open if the parts are not precisely placed on top of each other. Also looks like there is no easy way to take the unit apart. I am waiting for a response before attempting to take it apart.
customer_reviews.author: jamie klein-zoref

customer_reviews.title: PHILIPS HAS ALWAYS BEEN THE BEST
customer_reviews.text: I always buy Philips products, I trust the brand is best in what it offers. This technology, I believe was developed by PHILIPS and it works perfect. I received it today, had side plate of fries for lunch........ nothing better than PHILIPS products!
customer_reviews.author: Kabanco

customer_reviews.title: Definitely worth the extra money!
customer_reviews.text: love it! i have done chicken, nuggets, fries, veggies. There is a learning curve to not over cook food but totally worth it.
customer_reviews.author: Me 1

customer_reviews.title: Downgrade from previous model
customer_reviews.text: Just so much smaller then the old version with controls that are now, somehow, harder to use. I regret this purchase as a replacement of the older model.
customer_reviews.author: MarkB

customer_reviews.title: It does what it's advertised as doing.
customer_reviews.text: Our son, to whom we gave this at Christmas, says it's the best item he has ever received. He's an excellent cook and really loves this air fryer. I also bought one for our grandson's bride-to-be for one of the showers. They, too, say it's THE BEST and makes dinner preparation for them (they both work) so much easier. All in all, a terrific buy!!
customer_reviews.author: Patricia Wiggins

customer_reviews.title: Didn't want to order extra parts
customer_reviews.text: To be fair, I didn't use this product. I took it out of the box and thought it was missing parts until I looked at the fine print. This does not come with two important parts that I assumed would be standard given the price and size of this airfryer. It doesn't come with a shelf so you can separate the food and it is missing a grill. You can order these parts for an additional fee thru Philips, but I didn't want to pay another $30-$50
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Works great!
customer_reviews.text: I chose the Philips TurboStar because it was the best rated air fryer at Cook’s Illustrated. I prepared chicken, fish, seafood, and vegetables with it, and I very happy with the results. Easy to use and easy to clean, what’s not to love about it?
customer_reviews.author: Dr. Karin M. Anderson

customer_reviews.title: Home cookin’ in half the time.
customer_reviews.text: I bought this appliance for my special needs son, who lives on his own now. He and his caregiver love using it because my son can get a great meal and his aide can get the meal prepared in a fraction of the time. He works ten hours a day, so when he gets to his home, they need all the time they can get considering his hygiene needs take quite a lot of time also.
customer_reviews.author: David L.

customer_reviews.title: Very Satisfied
customer_reviews.text: I purchased a refurbished Phillips air fryer because it was rated as the best and I didn’t want to pay full price and not like it. It came packaged as if were new with everything. I am very Please with it. Perfect.. works beyond my expectations.*****😋
customer_reviews.author: Rita Eaton

customer_reviews.title: Game changer kitchen appliance!
customer_reviews.text: I rarely write product reviews but I have to complement the quality of this air fryer! Cooking meats are so easy and much less greasy! The air circulation actually compressed the excessive fat out of the meat which makes my meals very healthy! More importantly, it’s very time saving! I can finish cooking for lunch or dinner in 15 mins and it comes out so delicious! Highly recommend!!!!
customer_reviews.author: RANJIA ZHANG

customer_reviews.title: Simple air fryer does what is says
customer_reviews.text: Found this simple air fryer that does what it says - got a grea deal for $99.00 plus free shipping on a refurbished product. I don’t have to heat up my large convection oven or even wait until the oven heats up. You pop in whatever you want to cook and it can do it within 10-15 minutes. Great addition to my kitchen cooking.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use and clean air fryer
customer_reviews.text: I researched air fryers before buying this Phillips TurboStar. We love it. We pre-heat it for 5 min and easily set it for whatever temperature and time we need. Food is delicious and healthy! Cleaning is under 2 min. as the tray pops out from the base. Love this product!
customer_reviews.author: lovinglife7

customer_reviews.title: Great air fryer
customer_reviews.text: Love my Philips Air Fryer! Size is perfect for 2 people. Have made chicken, fries so far, and came out perfect. Would have bought the larger one, but too big for my counter!! Very happy with my purchase!
customer_reviews.author: LINDA A KIDA

customer_reviews.title: Doesn't bake
customer_reviews.text: Had thought this model could also bake. After scouring the manual, and website, finally called customer service. After some research, the rep said this model wouldn't bake. I returned it without ever using it.
customer_reviews.author: C. Niemi

customer_reviews.title: Amazing
customer_reviews.text: I was definitely one of thise skeptics when it came to this appliance but now I'm just blown away. This sul change the way you cook, eat, and think of food. Definitely recommend to anyone.
customer_reviews.author: Ramon

customer_reviews.title: A must have for kitchen
customer_reviews.text: Wonderful addition to my kitchen. We are absolutely thrilled with the AirFryer. It is compact yet awful. We have tried a lot of different receipts from YouTube and mostly turned out great. It took some tries and error with temperature and cook time for those without receipts. It asks wonderful fry and chicken nuggets. Highly recommended.
customer_reviews.author: Peter Chiou

customer_reviews.title: Great performance
customer_reviews.text: Love this new digital Air Fryer. Very easy to use, the controls are very simple. The cooking performance is superb. Dishwasher cleaning is easy.
customer_reviews.author: Justin

customer_reviews.title: Great air fryer!!!
customer_reviews.text: I should have gotten the bigger one but this one is amazing. The flavor of the food and how easy it is to clean is very impressive. Absolutely love this air fryer.
customer_reviews.author: MEspada

customer_reviews.title: I have used this a few times and things came out perfect
customer_reviews.text: I have used this to cook up some fried fish and scallops as well as fried chicken. They all came out great. Cleanup was a breeze.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Excellent
customer_reviews.text: I had previously bought a cheap gowise air fryer from Walmart that would either undercook or burn food. The philips air fryer has been amazing. Food gets cooked very evenly and the fryer itself is very solidly built.
customer_reviews.author: Amazoner

customer_reviews.title: Good product
customer_reviews.text: Great product. Quite a learning curve but overall makes food taste good with very little oil. I have no room on counter top so have to pick up and move when cooking, so a bit heavier than expected. Had to return based on a bit of a defect. I would buy again but not at this time.
customer_reviews.author: R C

customer_reviews.title: Too expensive
customer_reviews.text: It’s too too expensive Nice looking Hard to use it but taste ok I don’t think it worse that much
customer_reviews.author: Thomas

customer_reviews.title: Love it! Much healthier!
customer_reviews.text: Should have bought this earlier! I love this product so much! Being a breastfeeding mom, I try to avoid fast food, but sometimes you just want some fries so bad! Food comes out from the air fryer contains much less oil! Feel so much healthier!
customer_reviews.author: Jing

customer_reviews.title: Gotta have this one
customer_reviews.text: Can’t be without this- cooks so fast Food is cooked in a healthy manner- Taste great - French fries are crispy and perfect-
customer_reviews.author: David M . Altamura

customer_reviews.title: Takes a while to learn
customer_reviews.text: Since this is a totally new kind of cooking appliance, there is quite a learning curve. I have tried a couple of air fryer cookbooks, one of which helps a lot, if you are a beginner with this type of cooking. However, when you get it right, it's excellent. No doubt I will be continuing to learn for a while. But it's a fun adventure. I enjoy making my own recipe of small pizzas especially. Great for different types of fried potatoes.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I didn't want to "you get for what you pay for" so I decide on this and I'm so glad I did
customer_reviews.text: I research and research for all the air fryers, but at the end of the day, I didn't want to "you get for what you pay for" so I decide on this and I'm so glad I did! I've have use this almost everyday and it's working like a champ! I don't think you'll be disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Mocksaly

customer_reviews.title: Doesn't taste like fried food
customer_reviews.text: Small portion sizes, doesn't cook very even, not what I thought it would be.
customer_reviews.author: Kim Sherrod

customer_reviews.title: Good product
customer_reviews.text: I really like this air fryer, much better than a conventional oven that I had to pre-heat up to a certain temp. before use. We use it often to heat up frozen fried food without adding any oil. Heat up food fast, convenient and no mess. And of course, no more "Is it done yet?" from my kids :)
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Best purchase of our new home
customer_reviews.text: Great product!!! I can cook anything I want! It doesn't require pre-heating which is practical to put the food inside! Easy to clean, use hot water and detergent to help and I usually take the grease off when it is still liquid. I am truly satisfied with this purchase!!!
customer_reviews.author: Cynthia Murakami

customer_reviews.title: You get what you pay for
customer_reviews.text: It works well and fast. It's way easier to clean then my last air fryer(I out tin foil on the bottom. Saves you from having to do another piece. It's also really compact. If you are gonna spend money on an air fryer save up for this one.
customer_reviews.author: Jared

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: Had a basic one andas I got into air frying more was looking for something thst could do more and better... Look no more, this is the perfect machine!
customer_reviews.author: Patrick From Texas

customer_reviews.title: Couldn't be simpler to use.
customer_reviews.text: Still learning what it can do, but from frozen snacks to roasting chicken it's hard to not like the convenience and easy clean-up.
customer_reviews.author: Chris B

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Love it. Makes crisp French fries. Will never go back to frying with oil again
customer_reviews.author: Scuba Girl

customer_reviews.title: This air fryer is a good product. At first my wife didn’t want it
customer_reviews.text: This air fryer is a good product. At first my wife didn’t want it, but I ordered it anyway. We have cooked several different foods and most of them are pretty good. My wife still doen’t know how to use any of the controls, but I handle that. Easy to clean and easy to use. Recommend this product to anyone that wants a pretty good quality air fryer.
customer_reviews.author: Stanley Ruby

customer_reviews.title: Works well for crispy brussels sprout leaves
customer_reviews.text: I bought this so I did not have to use a deep fat fryer to make crispy brussels sprout leaves. It works great for this.
customer_reviews.author: French

customer_reviews.title: Great air fryer choice
customer_reviews.text: I was skeptical of the product but it’s amazing! We love it! Our go to is chicken tenders but we have also done tator tots, fish, lamb, and much more. No oils needed at all so a great way to cut fats!
customer_reviews.author: R.

customer_reviews.title: Love this brand
customer_reviews.text: Have bought 3 of these and love, love this air fryer. Mostly because they work very well.
customer_reviews.author: Annie

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use & easy to wash.
customer_reviews.text: I really love this machine. Easy to use easy to wash,
customer_reviews.author: Bee

customer_reviews.title: After a short learning curve I am able to use ...
customer_reviews.text: After a short learning curve I am able to use this machine for its intended use. This is a well-built kitchen appliance.
customer_reviews.author: Brave Explorer

customer_reviews.title: easy to use, and easy to clean
customer_reviews.text: good products, just hope the additional accessories can be cheaper
customer_reviews.author: JQ

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: Would like to see a chart to help better the end results
customer_reviews.author: Charles

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: WIFE LOVES THIS MACHINE, RELIABLE SO FAR, AND FOOD ISN'T LOADED WITH OIL FROM FRYING, TASTY FOOD FAST
customer_reviews.author: james m edwards

customer_reviews.title: Better than microwaving many things.
customer_reviews.text: Works slick, food tastes great, great way to reduce calories by eliminating oil.
customer_reviews.author: Another Oner

customer_reviews.title: Not the cheapest, but it works well
customer_reviews.text: Easy to use. You can only control temperature and time. Food comes out cooked evenly. Adjust time/temperature to control doneness/crispyness.
customer_reviews.author: Andy

customer_reviews.title: Fries comes out crispy and you can even cook hamburges and they come out like if you cook it on the grill
customer_reviews.text: I was skeptical about the airfryers but this machine change my mind. Fries comes out crispy and you can even cook hamburges and they come out like if you cook it on the grill. I recomend this machine.
customer_reviews.author: Bernardo C. Tacoronte

customer_reviews.title: Good
customer_reviews.text: Awesome device. Selling the add ons all separately is b.s., but, food is great with this.
customer_reviews.author: Michael

customer_reviews.title: Disappointing
customer_reviews.text: Unfortunately, it takes much longer and easier if you fry the food. Only good for making food for two people. The use was not intuitive and comes with no instructions except pictures that really don't help. Not seeing the value I was hoping for.
customer_reviews.author: ANDREA GRAHAM

customer_reviews.title: Did anyone else have it melt after 2 1/2 years?
customer_reviews.text: Love this thing but it melted after 2 1/2 years. I bought it end of November 2017 and in March 2020 it melted. A hole about two quarters wide.
customer_reviews.author: Janine

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: Works great just wish I purchased the bigger one cuz this is to small
customer_reviews.author: Jonathan

customer_reviews.title: Convenient and Healthy
customer_reviews.text: Everything I've tried has come about perfect. Worth the investment. Americas Test Kitchen has a great cookbook.
customer_reviews.author: Cape Cod

customer_reviews.title: Great air fryer
customer_reviews.text: Haven't had any problems with the air fryer so far, have had it for over a month now. We use it pretty much every day. food comes out great and even use it for a boneless skinless chicken breast and it come out great.
customer_reviews.author: Vickie

customer_reviews.title: Love it.
customer_reviews.text: Purchased this one for my future son-in-law, but it’s the same one I have. I bought mine because Cooks Illustrated rated it as the best out there and I wasn’t disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Lynn Covert

customer_reviews.title: Nice fryer!
customer_reviews.text: Lots of recipes online, very easy to use! Convenient construction so many of the components can be put into the dishwasher.
customer_reviews.author: Eric Knudsen

customer_reviews.title: Awesome for 2 people
customer_reviews.text: It is just my wife and I, this is the perfect size for us to have a full meal. We both work and comimg home to cook a full meal on the stove is tedious at best. This fryer has solved our problems.
customer_reviews.author: Matthew

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: this thing is pretty awesome. Excellent for low fat cooking
customer_reviews.author: Brian Busch

customer_reviews.title: Top notch!  Highly recommend!
customer_reviews.text: I love this airfryer! So easy to clean and works great!
customer_reviews.author: CathO

customer_reviews.title: As described
customer_reviews.text: The air fryer is working great and is a healthier way to enjoy our favorite foods such as french fries and bacon
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: we love it, easy clean up and so many things ...
customer_reviews.text: My first Air fryer, we love it, easy clean up and so many things to fry. We even make grilled Cheese in it.
customer_reviews.author: Robert Kacperowski

customer_reviews.title: Frozen fried foods are excellent.  Other stuff - meh
customer_reviews.text: The fried shrimp are nearly restaurant quality good. French fries are very good too. The breaded eggplant and vegan breaded chicken patties are tastier when crisped in a pan on the stove. I'm glad I have it but will probably use it only for fried seafood and french fries.
customer_reviews.author: PitBull Ma

customer_reviews.title: Great for summer meals
customer_reviews.text: This air fryer is so easy to use and the food comes out crisp on the outside and soft on the inside. Great for summertime and not turning on the oven.
customer_reviews.author: John S.

customer_reviews.title: If you want to air fryer this is the one to get
customer_reviews.text: If you want to air fryer this is the one to get
customer_reviews.author: MEMY5953

customer_reviews.title: Fast and tasty food.
customer_reviews.text: Works perfect, make the chicken in 15 minutes, cooks very fast and with only a spray of oil, and let the food more juicy.
customer_reviews.author: ANDRES  STEFAN

customer_reviews.title: Great Buy
customer_reviews.text: The reviews were great and so glad I went with this one.
customer_reviews.author: Pinkie

product_meta.title: Philips Kitchen Appliances Avance Digital Turbostar Airfryer (1.8lb/2.75qt), Mini-v192, Old
product_meta.description: Style Name:Digital| Size:Mini-v192Enjoy healthier snacks and meals with this Philips HD9641/96 TurboStar air fryer. Cook fries with spectacular flavor and more evenly while creating crispy shells and tender insides. This Philips TurboStar air fryer saves you time with the Quick Control dial and four presets for common dishes. Cooks fried food 50% more evenly and has 4 presets for your most popular dishes: Frozen fries, meat, fish and drumsticks. The removable nonstick coated drawer of the food basket of the air fryer are dishwasher safe for easy cleaning. Holds up to 1.8-lbs. of food. Voltage - 120 V.
feature_bullets: Unique TurboStar Technology for healthier cooking and frying.
The air fryer cooks fried food 50% more evenly
5 presets for most popular dishes including a keep warm function.
Quick control dial with digital display
Over 200 recipes in app and free recipe book included
